Img3Sum
AboutContact usFeatures

Features

Core Features

  1. Optical character recognition of an image file with English text

  2. Summarize extracted English text to 3 sentences

  3. Translate summarized English text to Korean

Core Technology

TextRank

TextRank is a graph-based ranking model for text processing which can be used in order to find the most relevant sentences in text and also to find keywords.

OCR

OCR program used to extract the text of the image is pyteseract which is a wrapper for Googleâ€™s Tesseract-OCR Engine.

Web

Backend was built as a flask, and frontend was referred to W3S.

Papago

Papago is a multilingual machine translation cloud service provided by Naver Corporation.

Img3Sum

  • Img3Sum
  • kaoara@naver.com
  • Lainshower

Open-source project that supports translating, summarizing and converting images to text.
